db:abstract.db:para: A simple browser based on Qt WebEngine Widgets.

name="gridLayout" columnstretch="0,0" columnminimumwidth="0,0"> <item row="0" column="0"> <widget class="QLabel" name="m_iconLabel"> <property name="text"> <string>Icon</string> </property> <property
